game.name: MALCADE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Survive a killer arcade machine in MALCADE. Spend tokens, play arcade games, win tickets, unlock the path forward and escape after getting thrown into a deadly game - is winning worth the cost?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive a killer arcade machine in MALCADE. Spend tokens, play arcade games, win tickets, unlock the path forward and escape after getting thrown into a deadly game - is winning worth the cost?
